definitions.text: searching for or buying goods or services
examples: went shopping for a reliable plumber
does her shopping at the mall rather than down town

definitions.text: the commodities purchased from stores; women carrying home shopping didn't give me a second glance"
examples: she loaded her shopping into the car

definitions.text: do one's shopping at; do business with; be a customer or client of

examples: I don't need help, I'm just browsing
He told on his classmate who had cheated on the exam
